directions: Mix tomatoes with green chile peppers, Mexican-style corn, yellow and white corn, white corn with chipotle peppers, cucumber, red bell peppers, cilantro, red onion, and lime juice together in a large bowl.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
1 (15.25 ounce) can yellow and white corn, drained
2 (11 ounce) cans white corn with chipotle peppers
1 large seedless cucumber, peeled and diced
1/4 cup diced red onion, or more to taste
title: Easy Corn Salad - Great Side for BBQs
